name: Ecoin Finance
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: ECOIN is a decentralized & deflationary BEP-20 token that aims to be an online payment platform replacing conventional fiat currency through our integrated debit card.
